non_clinical_staff.role_description: Front-desk staff, pharmacy/radiology assistants, janitors, and general support staff focused on daily task execution.

metrics.Description: Total number of patient arrivals in the month
metrics.Calculation: Sum of patient arrivals for the month

metrics.Description: Daily count of patient arrivals (JSON format)
metrics.Calculation: Aggregated from daily patient logs, may include fractional values due to smoothing or averaging

metrics.Description: Emergency bed utilization rate (%)
ED staff utilization rate (%)
Total number of outpatient visits in the month
metrics.Calculation: Sum of daily outpatient visit counts

metrics.Description: Dictionary of estimated daily outpatient visit counts
metrics.Calculation: Estimated daily values derived from operational data; may include fractional values due to smoothing or averaging

metrics.Description: Total number of surgeries performed in the month
metrics.Calculation: Sum of daily surgery counts for the month

metrics.Description: Dictionary with daily count of surgeries (JSON format)
metrics.Calculation: Aggregated from daily surgery logs (stored as JSON), may include fractional values due to smoothing or averaging

metrics.Description: Percentage of surgeries that started on time
Total number of radiology studies performed in the month
metrics.Calculation: Sum of daily study counts for the month

metrics.Description: Dictionary with daily count of radiology studies performed (JSON format)
metrics.Calculation: Aggregated from daily imaging logs (stored as JSON), may include fractional values due to smoothing or averaging

metrics.Description: Utilization rate of radiology equipment
metrics.Calculation: (Time Equipment in Use / Total Time Available) * 100

metrics.Description: Total number of lab tests performed in the month
Dictionary of daily lab test counts
metrics.Calculation: Estimated daily test volumes; values may be fractional due to averaging or smoothing

metrics.Description: Number of medication errors reported
Number of formal patient complaints received
metrics.Calculation: Count of formal complaints by patients

metrics.Description: Average number of days to collect payment

administrative_staff.role_description: HR, scheduling, logistics, and compliance staff responsible for operations coordination and planning.

metrics.Description: Average length of stay in ED (monthly)
metrics.Calculation: Mean time spent by patients in ED

metrics.Description: Daily length of stay in ED (JSON format)
metrics.Calculation: Aggregated daily stay durations, may include fractional values due to smoothing or averaging

metrics.Description: Patient satisfaction score (scale of 1â€“5)
Emergency bed utilization rate (%)
ED staff utilization rate (%)
Average inpatient length of stay in days
metrics.Calculation: Total Patient Days / Number of Discharges

metrics.Description: Average score from patient satisfaction surveys (1â€“5 scale)
Average time in minutes spent per outpatient consultation
metrics.Calculation: Total Consultation Time / Number of Consultations

metrics.Description: Average patient satisfaction score (1â€“5 scale)
Percentage of surgeries cancelled
Average duration of surgeries in minutes
metrics.Calculation: Mean time from start to end of surgery

metrics.Description: Rate of surgeries requiring blood transfusion
Percentage of surgeries that started on time
Average length of stay (in days) post-surgery
metrics.Calculation: Mean hospital stay in days after surgery

metrics.Description: Utilization rate of radiology equipment
metrics.Calculation: (Time Equipment in Use / Total Time Available) * 100

metrics.Description: Percentage compliance with pharmacy protocols
Average length of stay in ICU in days
metrics.Calculation: Total ICU Days / Number of Discharges

metrics.Description: Average patient satisfaction score (1â€“5 scale)
Score from internal or external compliance audits
metrics.Calculation: Weighted audit score based on compliance factors

metrics.Description: Percentage compliance with hand hygiene protocols
Percentage of staff who completed safety training
Overall patient satisfaction score (typically on a scale of 1 to 5)
Average time taken to resolve patient issues (in hours)
metrics.Calculation: Calculated as average resolution time per case

managers.role_description: Department heads and operations managers who oversee performance, strategy, and risk metrics.

metrics.Description: Date of metric recording
Unique identifier for emergency department
Total number of patient arrivals in the month
metrics.Calculation: Sum of patient arrivals for the month

metrics.Description: Daily count of patient arrivals (JSON format)
metrics.Calculation: Aggregated from daily patient logs, may include fractional values due to smoothing or averaging

metrics.Description: Average waiting time (arrival to first treatment) in minutes (monthly)
Daily average waiting times (JSON format)
metrics.Calculation: Aggregated daily averages from ED system

metrics.Description: Average time from door to doctor in minutes
metrics.Calculation: Mean time from ED entry to first doctor seen

metrics.Description: Average length of stay in ED (monthly)
metrics.Calculation: Mean time spent by patients in ED

metrics.Description: Daily length of stay in ED (JSON format)
metrics.Calculation: Aggregated daily stay durations, may include fractional values due to smoothing or averaging

metrics.Description: Left Without Being Seen (LWBS) rate (%)
metrics.Calculation: (# Left Without Being Seen / Total ED Patients) * 100

metrics.Description: Percentage of ED patients admitted to inpatient
metrics.Calculation: (# Admitted from ED / Total ED Patients) * 100

metrics.Description: Distribution of patient acuity levels (JSON format)
metrics.Calculation: Proportions of patients by acuity level (Level 1â€“5)

metrics.Description: Time to first pain management (in minutes)
metrics.Calculation: Mean time to administer pain medication

metrics.Description: Time to first ECG (in minutes)
metrics.Calculation: Mean time to first ECG post-arrival

metrics.Description: Rate of repeat visits to ED (%)
Patient satisfaction score (scale of 1â€“5)
Emergency bed utilization rate (%)
ED staff utilization rate (%)
The reporting month for inpatient metrics
Unique identifier for the ward or unit
Average percentage of beds occupied during the month
Dictionary of daily bed occupancy rates
metrics.Calculation: Estimated daily occupancy percentages, may include fractional values due to smoothing or averaging

metrics.Description: Average inpatient length of stay in days
metrics.Calculation: Total Patient Days / Number of Discharges

metrics.Description: Percentage of patients readmitted within 30 days
Healthcare-associated infection rate per 1,000 patient days
Percentage of inpatient deaths
Rate of patient admissions and discharges relative to capacity
Average time in minutes to complete patient discharge
metrics.Calculation: Mean discharge processing time per patient

metrics.Description: Average number of nurses per patient
Rate of medication errors per 1,000 patient days
Average number of inpatients present per day
metrics.Calculation: Sum of Daily Patient Count / Days in Month

metrics.Description: Dictionary of daily inpatient census counts
metrics.Calculation: Estimated daily patient census, may include fractional values due to smoothing or averaging

metrics.Description: Percentage of patients discharged earlier than planned
Average score from patient satisfaction surveys (1â€“5 scale)
The reporting month for outpatient metrics
Unique identifier for the outpatient clinic or department
Total number of outpatient visits in the month
metrics.Calculation: Sum of daily outpatient visit counts

metrics.Description: Dictionary of estimated daily outpatient visit counts
metrics.Calculation: Estimated daily values derived from operational data; may include fractional values due to smoothing or averaging

metrics.Description: Percentage of scheduled appointments missed by patients
Average time in minutes spent per outpatient consultation
metrics.Calculation: Total Consultation Time / Number of Consultations

metrics.Description: Percentage of visits that resulted in a referral to a specialist
Average patient wait time in minutes before seeing a provider
metrics.Calculation: Average time from check-in to consultation

metrics.Description: Percentage of follow-up visits completed within recommended period
Average patient satisfaction score (1â€“5 scale)
Average time in hours to return diagnostic test results
metrics.Calculation: Average turnaround time from test order to result delivery

metrics.Description: Percentage of outpatient consultations conducted via telehealth
Date of metric measurement
Type/category of surgery (e.g., GEN, ORTH, NEU, etc.)
Total number of surgeries performed in the month
metrics.Calculation: Sum of daily surgery counts for the month

metrics.Description: Dictionary with daily count of surgeries (JSON format)
metrics.Calculation: Aggregated from daily surgery logs (stored as JSON), may include fractional values due to smoothing or averaging

metrics.Description: Percentage of surgeries cancelled
Average duration of surgeries in minutes
metrics.Calculation: Mean time from start to end of surgery

metrics.Description: Rate of surgical site infections
Rate of patients returning unexpectedly after surgery
Post-surgery mortality rate
Rate of surgeries requiring blood transfusion
Percentage of surgeries that started on time
Rate of complications after surgery
Average length of stay (in days) post-surgery
metrics.Calculation: Mean hospital stay in days after surgery

metrics.Description: Date of metric recording
Type of imaging modality (e.g., MRI, CT, XRAY, US, NM)
Total number of radiology studies performed in the month
metrics.Calculation: Sum of daily study counts for the month

metrics.Description: Dictionary with daily count of radiology studies performed (JSON format)
metrics.Calculation: Aggregated from daily imaging logs (stored as JSON), may include fractional values due to smoothing or averaging

metrics.Description: Average turnaround time to generate radiology reports (in hours)
metrics.Calculation: Average time from study to report availability

metrics.Description: Accuracy rate of radiology reports
Average radiation dose delivered per study (in milliSieverts)
Utilization rate of radiology equipment
metrics.Calculation: (Time Equipment in Use / Total Time Available) * 100

metrics.Description: Average time patients wait before imaging (in minutes)
metrics.Calculation: Mean wait time per patient before imaging

metrics.Description: Percentage of studies repeated due to quality or technical issues
Percentage of emergency imaging completed within target time
metrics.Calculation: (# Emergency Scans Completed in Time / Total Emergency Requests) * 100

metrics.Description: The reporting month for lab metrics
Category or department of lab tests (e.g., HEMA, BIOC)
Total number of lab tests performed in the month
Dictionary of daily lab test counts
metrics.Calculation: Estimated daily test volumes; values may be fractional due to averaging or smoothing

metrics.Description: Average turnaround time in hours for lab test results
metrics.Calculation: Total Time to Report / Number of Tests

metrics.Description: Percentage of tests with errors
Percentage of critical lab values reported within target time
metrics.Calculation: (Critical Results Reported on Time / Total Critical Results) * 100

metrics.Description: Total hours lab equipment was non-operational
metrics.Calculation: Sum of downtime incidents for lab equipment

metrics.Description: Percentage of samples rejected due to quality or procedural issues
Percentage of admitted patients who received at least one lab test
Date of metric measurement
Category/type of medication dispensed (e.g., ORAL, INJ, ONC)
Percentage of errors during medication dispensing
Rate at which inventory is cycled (Inventory Turnover)
metrics.Calculation: Cost of Goods Sold / Average Inventory

metrics.Description: Percentage of medications dispensed that are generics
Percentage of times medication stock was unavailable
metrics.Calculation: (# Out of Stock Occurrences / Total Requests) * 100

metrics.Description: Average time taken to dispense medication (in minutes)
Percentage compliance with pharmacy protocols
Percentage of patients who received counseling with medication
Percentage of adverse drug reactions reported
The reporting month for ICU metrics
Unique identifier for the ICU unit
Average percentage of occupied ICU beds in the month
Dictionary of daily ICU bed occupancy rates
metrics.Calculation: Raw daily occupancy percentages, may include fractional values due to smoothing or averaging

metrics.Description: Average length of stay in ICU in days
metrics.Calculation: Total ICU Days / Number of Discharges

metrics.Description: Rate of VAP cases per 1,000 ventilator days
Percentage of ICU patients who died
Ratio of nurses to patients in the ICU
metrics.Calculation: Number of Nurses / Number of Patients

metrics.Description: Average time in minutes to administer antibiotics
metrics.Calculation: Average time from order to administration

metrics.Description: Central line-associated bloodstream infection rate per 1,000 line days
Percentage of patients readmitted to ICU within 48 hours
Percentage of patients screened for sepsis upon ICU admission
Average APACHE II score for ICU patients
metrics.Calculation: Mean of APACHE II scores for all ICU patients

metrics.Description: Average SOFA score for ICU patients
metrics.Calculation: Mean of SOFA scores for all ICU patients

metrics.Description: The reporting month for administrative metrics
Unique identifier for the hospital or department
Revenue generated per patient per day
Average cost incurred per case handled
metrics.Calculation: Total Operational Cost / Number of Cases

metrics.Description: Percentage of staff who left during the period
Average overtime hours worked per staff member
Percentage of accurate bills issued
Average time in minutes patients wait for admission
metrics.Calculation: Average time from registration to admission

metrics.Description: Average patient satisfaction score (1â€“5 scale)
Score from internal or external compliance audits
metrics.Calculation: Weighted audit score based on compliance factors

metrics.Description: Average number of days to process insurance claims
metrics.Calculation: Total Days to Process / Number of Claims

metrics.Description: Date of metric measurement
Unique identifier for department
Number of reported patient safety incidents
metrics.Calculation: Total safety incidents logged per department

metrics.Description: Number of patient falls per 1,000 patient-days
Incidence rate of pressure ulcers in the department
Number of medication errors reported
Percentage compliance with hand hygiene protocols
Number of formal patient complaints received
metrics.Calculation: Count of formal complaints by patients

metrics.Description: Percentage of staff who completed safety training
Score from internal safety audit (out of 100)
metrics.Calculation: Average score from safety compliance audits

metrics.Description: The reporting month for financial metrics
Unique identifier for the hospital or department
Total revenue generated in the month
metrics.Calculation: Sum of all revenue streams (billing, insurance, etc.)

metrics.Description: Average number of days to collect payment
Percentage of claims denied by insurers
Average cost incurred per medical procedure
Percentage of insurance claims approved
Percentage of total revenue successfully collected
Proportion of expenses relative to revenue
Difference between actual and budgeted expenses
Date of the recorded metrics
metrics.Calculation: Direct entry or calculated based on survey results

metrics.Description: Unique identifier for the hospital
Net Promoter Score indicating likelihood of patient recommendation (0-100)
Overall patient satisfaction score (typically on a scale of 1 to 5)
Average time taken to resolve patient issues (in hours)
metrics.Calculation: Calculated as average resolution time per case

metrics.Description: Percentage of patients who would recommend the hospital
metrics.Calculation: Calculated from survey data on patient recommendations

metrics.Description: Average time taken to respond to patient inquiries (in minutes)
metrics.Calculation: Average time from issue raised to first response

metrics.Description: Percentage of patients who completed educational materials
metrics.Calculation: Percentage of patients who completed assigned educational content
